title: Boy, 17, shot to death at West Baltimore gas station
content:
A 17-year-old was shot to death at a West Baltimore gas station Monday night, police said.
A Western District patrol officer was driving about 11:30 p.m. in the 900 block of N. Monroe Street, where he saw a group of people standing around someone lying in the BP gas station parking lot, police said.
The teenager, Bruce Hamilton, of the 1800 block of Mosher Street, had been shot in the stomach and was taken to the University of Maryland Shock Trauma Center, where he died a short time later, police said.
Police detained several potential witnesses and brought them to the homicide unit to be interviewed.
Anyone with information may call the homicide unit at 410-396-2100 or call Metro Crime Stoppers at 1-866-7LOCKUP.
